DOC.brief_summary: This randomize control study evaluate effect individualized physical activity prescription ( PAP ) old overweight adult . The primary hypothesis individualize prescription physical activity increase physical activity level overweight old adult 6 month . Secondary hypothesis increase physical activity level improve cardio metabolic risk factor quality life . 200 woman men , age 65 low physical activity level , overweight , abdominal obesity , randomize intervention group control group . The control group receive general information physical activity registration physical activity level one week . The intervention group receive addition individualized physical activity prescription patient-centered counseling . After six month group go health check-up baseline follow-up take place 12 24 month .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Prescription Overweight Older Adults
